content.raw:
I'm reviewing this issue and I'm able to reproduce it now in my precise chroot.

My diagnostic is:

 *  A [commit affecting getPlugins to roslib](https://github.com/ros/ros/commit/494bc0ba2c1cebc9cbedb183b32bd57a271af8d3) broke the ABI (perfectly fine for ROS policy).
 * It [was released on Jun 24th](http://lists.ros.org/pipermail/ros-users/2014-June/068695.html), as  ros-hydro-roslib 1.10.10-0
 * Since this, our wrapper version for hydro is broken.

We have to re-release the gazebo3 ROS wrappers to fix this problem but I want to fix our internal ABI detector first.
content.html:
I'm reviewing this issue and I'm able to reproduce it now in my precise chroot.

My diagnostic is:

  • A commit affecting getPlugins to roslib broke the ABI (perfectly fine for ROS policy).
  • It was released on Jun 24th, as ros-hydro-roslib 1.10.10-0
  • Since this, our wrapper version for hydro is broken.

We have to re-release the gazebo3 ROS wrappers to fix this problem but I want to fix our internal ABI detector first.
